document_data.name: Cherrybread
document_data.location:
[[Luskan]]
[[Sword Coast North]]
[[Border Kingdoms]]
[[Vilhon Reach]]
[[Sea of Fallen Stars]] coasts
document_data.mainbody: '''Cherrybread''', also known as the '''Vilholn Cherrybread''' on the [[Sword Coast]], was a sweet [[molasses]] [[bread]] with diced and alcohol-soaked [[Cherry|cherries]], popular in the [[Vilhon Reach]], [[Border Kingdoms]], and the region of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], with it's popularity reaching the Sword Coast in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
document_data.Description: Even though Vilholn cherrybread was mostly made with cherries, the original dish, popular in the Border Kingdoms and Vilhon could be made with various types of fruit, finely diced and marinated in spirits. The ready bread was often sold as a whole loaf or per slice, wrapped in leaves to keep it moist.
